sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya belum pernah sampai di Bali.
english translation: "I have never been to Bali before."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sampai sekarang, saya belum mendapatkan pekerjaan.
english translation: "Until now, I haven't found a job."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita akan mengadakan sampanye ulang tahun besok.
english translation: "We will have a birthday party tomorrow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kakek tinggal di sana sejak bertahun-tahun yang lalu.
english translation: "Grandpa has been living there for many years."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Film itu sangat menarik.
english translation: "That film is very interesting."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah kamu sanggup menolong saya dengan pekerjaan ini?
english translation: "Are you able to help me with this task?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong sapu lantai kamar tidur.
english translation: "Please sweep the bedroom floor."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kamu bisa meminjam sapu tangan saya jika kamu perlu.
english translation: "You can borrow my handkerchief if you need it."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Burung sedang membangun sarang di pohon itu.
english translation: "The bird is building a nest on that tree."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah kamu sudah sarapan pagi ini?
english translation: "Have you had breakfast this morning?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku tidak bisa makan pedas karena punya sariawan.
english translation: "I can't eat spicy food because I have canker sores."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang sarjana jurusan ekonomi.
english translation: "He is a bachelor of economics."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang menjadi sarjana muda di Universitas.
english translation: "I am currently an undergraduate student at the University."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu memakai sarung saat pergi ke masjid.
english translation: "Mom wears a sarong when going to the mosque."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka makan satai ayam dengan saus kacang.
english translation: "I enjoy eating chicken satay with peanut sauce."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami sedang bermain permainan satu dua.
english translation: "We are playing a one two game."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saudara saya mengunjungi rumah kami akhir pekan lalu.
english translation: "My siblings visited our house last weekend."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buah sawo matang memiliki rasa manis.
english translation: "Ripe sapodilla has a sweet taste."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya belajar bahasa Indonesia.
english translation: "I am learning the Indonesian language."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya kira, ini adalah keputusan yang baik.
english translation: "I think this is a good decision."
